text: Entourage and Wisdom of the Crowd star Jeremy Piven has issued a statement strongly denying TV personality / actress Ariane Bellamar ’ s public accusations that the Emmy - winning actor groped her on the set of Entourage and at the Playboy Mansion several years ago. “ I unequivocally deny the appalling allegations being peddled about me.
